sentences.sContent: You can achieve greater flexibility, adaptability, and independence when each layer is only loosely coupled to the layer above and below.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can achieve greater flexibility, adaptability, and independence when each layer is only loosely coupled to the layer above and below.
sentences.sCn: 当每个层仅松散耦合到其上和其下的层时，您可以实现更强的灵活性、适应性和独立性。

sentences.sContent: We hope that positive social mechanisms that are conducive to human adaptability will play an ever more effective role in meeting the challenges of the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: We hope that positive social mechanisms that are conducive to human adaptability will play an ever more effective role in meeting the challenges of the future.
sentences.sCn: 我们寄希望于积极的社会机制，以期有助于人类更加适应自然，对未来的挑战扮演一个更加积极有效的角色。

words.tran: 适合的；能适应的；可修改的
适配器；改编者；接合器；适应者
适应；改编；改编本，改写本
[通信] 适配器；（美）改编者；转接器（等于adapter）
